content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: jungle_planks
inventory=[{"type": "oak_log", "quantity": 55, "index": 11}, {"type": "jungle_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "beetroot_seeds", "quantity": 44, "index": 32}, {"type": "green_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}, {"type": "pig_spawn_egg", "quantity": 48, "index": 43}]

thought: To solve this task I need to craft jungle_planks. Jungle_planks require placing 1 jungle_wood into the crafting table, therefore I will first need to move the jungle_wood from slot 19 into the crafting grid.
act: move from slot 19 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: jungle_planks
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "jungle_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "oak_log", "quantity": 55, "index": 11}, {"type": "beetroot_seeds", "quantity": 44, "index": 32}, {"type": "green_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}, {"type": "pig_spawn_egg", "quantity": 48, "index": 43}]
thought: Now I can craft the jungle_planks by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 12).
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 4
